description: A powershell script that removes Microsoft Edge and any of its dependencies. At your own risk.
notes: Disclaimer: Removing Microsoft Edge may break some system programs or break Windows. With administrator privilages, type edgeremoval.ps1 to run. Don't run this script a second time unless you did not have administrator. [Troubleshooting: If anything goes wrong, don't close powershell!  If you did anyway on Windows 11: Ctrl + Shift + Esc -> Run new task -> "explorer" -> enter. Alternatively find a way to run explorer on your computer.]
